authors.author: Aaron Williams Charles Coffin John Chandler

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The advent of our God, newline With eager hearts we greet; newline And we must praise Him in this hour, newline With hymns and anthems sweet.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: All glory to the Son, newline Who comes to set us free; newline With Father, Spirit ever One, newline Through all eternity.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The everlasting Son, newline Incarnate stoops to be; newline Himself the servant's form newline Puts on to set his people free.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Come, Zion's daughter, newline Rise to meet your lowly King; newline Nor let your faithless heart despise newline The peace He comes to bring.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: As judge, on clouds of light, newline He soon will come again; newline And all His scattered saints newline Unite with Him on high to reign.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Before the dawning day newline Let sin be put to flight; newline No longer let the law hold sway, newline But walk in freedom's light.
